textTemplates.name: sendEmailToUserForHostAndLead
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!getCurrentUser.Name},


You've recently {!changeInEvent} the following event:-

Name: {!Get_Campaign_Record.Name}

Link: {!campaignUrl}

The following Leads have not been notified, due to missing email

{!noEmailLeadList}


Thanks

textTemplates.name: sendEmailToUserForLeads
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!getCurrentUser.Name}


Following Leads have not been notified, due to missing email.

{!noEmailLeadList}


Thanks
